text: Ndipo musatsutsane ndi anthu okhulupirira za m’Buku pokhapokha kutakhala koyenera kutero, kupatula okhawo amene amachita zoipa. Nena, “Ife timakhulupirira mu izo zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa ife ndi zimene zidavumbulutsidwa kwa inu ndipo Mulungu wathu ndi Mulungu wanu ndi mmodzi ndipo ife tadzipereka kwa Iye.”
